short_summary: Acquisition of five (5) central unit metering devices in Varennes, Quebec Canada
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of five (5) central unit metering devices located in Varennes, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
duration_in_months: We will consider responses that include information from November 2023 to October 2025 as the contract duration will extend to October 31st, 2025
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal for Electrical Meters
#### Solicitation Number
WS4106361086
#### Reference Number
WS4106361086-Doc4130881447
#### Amendment Number
3
#### Deadline for Submission of Proposals
* Date: September 22, 2023
* Time: 14:00:00
#### Solicitation Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources Canada, invites proposals for the acquisition of five (5) central unit metering devices to be located in Varennes, Quebec, Canada.

#### Key Details
- UNSPSC Code: 41100000
- Industry Classification: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Permiaence and Security
This solicitation adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and expresses the vendor's concurrance with the provisions of the Canadian Government's ontremmmors actuc especialni comptetions rules.

#### Participating Parties
Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada

#### Methods of Presentation and Bid Preparation Presentation

The tenders or ventures is receiving solicitations for purchase electronics are to be directed to the government:
